name: pane-info
readme: # Pane Info _Pane Info_ is a package for Atom, which shows the filename of each pane. This plugin is useful for those of us who keep their tabs hidden. [![Pane Info Screenshot](https://github.com/sberan/atom-pane-info/raw/master/screenshot.png)](https://atom.io/packages/pane-info) ## Features * Hidden when only one pane is visible * Highlights current pane in blue ## Installation Simply run the following command: ```sh apm install pane-info ``` Or find the package in **Atom** → **Settings** → **Install** and search for "**pane-info**"
